mapper.select: select nb.notice_no as noticeNo, nb.message_ck as messageCk, nm.notice_link as noticLink, nm.notice_message as noticeMessage, date_format(nm.notice_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as noticeDate from user u join noticemsgbox nb on u.user_no = nb.user_no join noticemessage nm on nb.notice_no = nm.notice_no where u.user_no = #{userNo} order by notice_date
